Key Match Events: Devin Williams made a game-saving 10th-inning appearance to secure the win for the Brewers.
Willy Adames and Rowdy Tellez each hit home runs for the Brewers.
Jonathan India hit a home run for the Reds.
Post-Match Reflections: Brewers manager Craig Counsell expressed satisfaction with the team's resilience in coming back from a deficit to win the game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the fourth in a four-game series between the Brewers and Reds.
Others: The game was played at Great American Ball Park in Cincinnati, Ohio, with an attendance of 14,436.
